Uses of Interface
net.i2p.util.BandwidthEstimator

Packages that use BandwidthEstimator
Package
Description
net.i2p.client.streaming.impl
Implementation of a TCP-like (reliable, authenticated, in order) set of sockets for communicating over the IP-like (unreliable, unauthenticated, unordered) I2P messages.
net.i2p.router.transport
The transport system allows the usage of communication layers that are below I2P in the stack, on which I2P messages are sent.
net.i2p.router.transport.udp
The UDP transport (also known as 'SSU transport') allows passing I2P messages on top of UDP.

  • Uses of BandwidthEstimator in net.i2p.client.streaming.impl

    Classes in net.i2p.client.streaming.impl that implement BandwidthEstimator
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    (package private) class 
    SimpleBandwidthEstimator
    A Westwood+ bandwidth estimator with a first stage anti-aliasing low pass filter based on RTT, and the time-varying Westwood filter based on inter-arrival time.

  • Uses of BandwidthEstimator in net.i2p.router.transport

    Classes in net.i2p.router.transport that implement BandwidthEstimator
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    (package private) class 
    SyntheticREDQueue
    A "synthetic" queue in that it doesn't actually queue anything.
